The discovery of the massive drawing of: 2. The cat carving was found during remodeling work on an observation platform near the Nasca Lines and was at risk of disappearing due to natural erosion and its location on a steep slope.
The cat carving is estimated to be 2: 000 years old and was created between 200 to 100 years BCE.
The geoglyphs of Nasca and Palpa: including the cat carving, have been designated as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO due to their historical and archaeological significance.
